definitions.definition: Any salt or ester of barbituric acid .
Any of derivatives of barbituric acid that act as depressants of the central nervous system and are used as sedatives or hypnotics .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any salt or ester of barbituric acid .
secondary_definitions: ( pharmacology ) Any of derivatives of barbituric acid that act as depressants of the central nervous system and are used as sedatives or hypnotics .
